description: System-generated unique identifier for the shift record; used as the primary key and for joins across related tables.
Date-time the record was created or captured, in yyyymmddhhmmssSSS format; likely stored in UTC; confirm with SME.
Business label for the work period within a day to which assets or personnel are assigned (e.g., day/evening/night).
Identifier of the corresponding record in the source legacy system; enables traceability and data reconciliation.
Name of the source legacy table where this record originated; used for lineage, migration auditing, and troubleshooting.
